attributes.action: Give citizens of England parity with those in Wales and Scotland and remove prescription charges for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citizens in England have access to free presriptions if certain criteria apply. Not all citizens qualify for free precriptions and have to pay a fee of £7.10 for each item prescrbed. In Wales no prescription charges apply. Scotland precription charges are reducing and are due to be totally free by 2011. This is not fair and is discrimanatory.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
